title: Research Content Moved to API
abstract: All research content is now part of the bilingual system and served via the content API.
summary: The research database has been restructured to support the new bilingual habit system. All research citations are embedded within the habit data structure.
keyFindings: Research is now integrated with habit data
All studies include participant counts and effect sizes
practicalTips: Use EffectivenessRankingService for accessing research data
Research citations are embedded in habit translations
Check content API for latest research updates
migrationNote: Legacy research archived. New system provides research integrated with bilingual habit content.
